ygData.subject: Re: Question about multiple characters
ygData.msgSnippet: I play a High elf Enchanter, A Wood elf Bard, a Gnome Cleric, and will probably start another soon.  I find switching between them relaxing but the bard is
ygData.messageBody:
I play a High elf Enchanter, A Wood elf Bard, a Gnome Cleric, and will
probably start another soon. I find switching between them relaxing but the
bard is definitely my primary personna.

-----Original Message-----
From: DeGirolami, Franck [mailto:degirolami@...]
Sent: Wednesday, June 02, 1999 3:21 PM
To: Eqenchanters (E-mail)
Subject: [eqenchanters] Question about multiple characters


From: "DeGirolami, Franck" <degirolami@...>

How many of you are playing multiple characters at the same time?
I played first a dark elf necro up to level 16..
my main character is now an enchanter level 20..I've been playing her a lot
but since Saturday ( which is when I leveled ) I havent been fighting at
all, I'm in one of those travelling / meeting people mood.
Anyway, this morning I started a bard...I dont why ...I completely gave up
my necro when I started to play my enchanter. I dont want to do that this
time, but sometimes I get bored and I need something new...

Skara de Toxxulia
